entries.text: Thank you for calling StellarTech support. Your call is very important to us. Please hold while we connect you with the next available agent.
Thank you for calling StellarTech, this is David, how can I help you today?
Hi David, I recently purchased the Stellar X500 smart watch, and I have a few questions about some of its features.
Certainly! I'd be happy to assist you with that. What are your questions regarding the Stellar X500's features?

First, I'm a little concerned about the battery life. The advertisement said it lasts for days, but mine seems to drain quicker. What kind of battery life should I realistically expect with normal use?

That's a great question. The average battery life for the Stellar X500 with normal use, including heart rate monitoring and some notification alerts, is about 2 to 3 days. However, it can vary depending on the intensity of usage, such as GPS tracking or always-on display. Are you using the GPS function frequently?
I've used the GPS a couple of times, but not extensively. Also, is there a way to extend the battery life? Maybe turning off some less-used features?

Yes, absolutely. Disabling features like the always-on display and reducing the frequency of heart rate monitoring can significantly improve the battery life. You can find detailed instructions on how to manage these settings in the user manual, which is also available online on our website.
Okay, great. I'll check the user manual. My next question is about compatibility. I have an older Android phone. Is the Stellar X500 fully compatible with older Android versions?

The Stellar X500 is designed for broad compatibility. It supports Android versions 6.0 and above. If you're using an older version than that, some of the advanced features might be limited. Could you tell me what Android version you are using?
I'm on Android 7, so that should be fine then. One last question. What is the warranty on the Stellar X500?

The Stellar X500 comes with a one-year limited warranty covering manufacturer defects. This warranty does not cover accidental damage or misuse. If you encounter any hardware issues that fall under the warranty, please contact us, and we'll be happy to assist you. You can find the full warranty details in the user manual as well.
Perfect! That answers all my questions. Thanks so much for your help, David. I appreciate you explaining everything so clearly.
You're very welcome! I'm glad I could help. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that's all. Have a great day!
You too! Thank you for calling StellarTech support. Goodbye.
